name: Sun's Edge
storyline: The day of Crimson Sky changed the world for everyone. For several hours, our machines stopped working, monsters began destroying our cities, and the sky turned a blood red, before suddenly stopping without any clear reason. Ranger Machete has been chosen to explore the island of Solasta, ground zero of the Crimson Sky event, and find what caused it, and how to prevent it from happening again! He must be quick, the longer he takes, the sky turns bloodier and the sun begins to fade! Can Machete stop the end of our era and keep his loved ones safe? Or will the world fall to darkness?
summary: What would you do if the world was ending? In Sun's Edge, you are a ranger exploring the island of Solasta, trying to find a way to keep the world from falling to darkness! In this Aztec themed adventure game, you will need to fight, climb, and solve your way out of problems. Everyone is counting on you!
